name: Grippli Warrior
languages: Grippli plus one other language (usually Common, Draconic, or Primordial)

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The grippli can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.

actions.name: Tongue
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the grippli can't grab another creature.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.
